Israel to pull some troops from Gaza as war enters new phaseIsrael is withdrawing some forces from Gaza to shift to more targeted operations against Hamas, and is partially returning reservists to civilian life to help the economy as the country enters the new year set for a prolonged war, an Israeli official said. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 09:41:01 GMT H3DZ5OTS55JH3GHQ32当年https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-pulls-some-troops-gaza-war-enters-new-phase-2024-01-01/Dan Williams世界中东地区
Six killed in disputed region bordering Sudan, South SudanSix people including a senior local administrator were killed in an ambush by armed men in the Abyei region claimed by both Sudan and South Sudan, local officials said. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 09:40:02 GMT AU72M564BRMDBIETY2AH2KCYGM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/six-killed-disputed-region-border-sudan-south-sudan-2024-01-01/Waakhe Simon Wudu世界非洲
Israel plans to bring in more foreign workers for construction sector - reportIsrael plans to bring in around 70,000 foreign workers from China, India and elsewhere to boost its construction sector, which has been largely frozen since the Oct. 7 Hamas attack, a newspaper reported on Monday, citing a government official. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 09:06:00 GMT NZV5LO3RYFJZLO4TXZ7OOXOKUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-plans-to-bring-more-foreign-workers-construction-sector-report-2024-01-01/Reuters世界中东地区
More than 140 Rohingya arrive in Indonesia's North SumatraMore than 140 Rohingya have arrived in Indonesia's North Sumatra province over the weekend, state news agency Antara reported on Monday, adding to a surge of arrivals of members of the Myanmar Muslim minority to Indonesia. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 08:40:27 GMT H2FWIIPTZFP6JMHOWD436HFLJM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/more-than-140-rohingya-arrive-indonesia-north-sumatra-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Massive earthquake jolts Japan, residents evacuate coastA powerful earthquake and tsunami struck central Japan and its western coast on Monday, triggering warnings for residents to evacuate, knocking out power to thousands of homes and disrupting flights and rail services to the affected region. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 07:26:50 GMT第3346章https://www.reuters.com/world/japan/magnitude-74-earthquake-strikes-japan-tsunami-warning-issued-2024-01-01/Tim Kelly, Satoshi Sugiyama世界日本
Heavy rains in Australia's east bring more pain to storm-hit residentsHeavy rains lashed parts of Australia's east on Monday, triggering flash flooding, inundating roads and bringing more pain for some residents reeling after the intense thunderstorms that hit the region over the Christmas holidays. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 06:32:01 GMT 4P5Y3ZUVMFPI5N6LKXVRWEKMQA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/heavy-rains-eastern-australia-bring-more-pain-storm-hit-residents-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Zelenskiy speaks of war, Putin makes passing reference in contrasting New Year speechesUkraine President Volodymyr Zelenskiy honoured his people's resilience in times of bloodshed in a long and lyrical New Year speech, while Russian leader Vladimir Putin stressed his country's unity in a short and stern message that made only passing reference to the war. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 04:31:16 GMT L3NHAOQRENJKZAA2DROVGN34FY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-speaks-war-putin-makes-passing-reference-contrasting-new-year-speeches-2024-01-01/Lidia Kelly世界欧洲
China's Xi, US President Biden exchange congratulations on 45 years of diplomatic tiesChina's President Xi Jinping exchanged congratulations with U.S. President Joe Biden on the 45th anniversary of diplomatic ties between the two countries, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 03:24:40 GMT 5I2XUBDZIBN6DMNEODKM4RYU7A https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-xi-us-president-biden-exchange-congratulations-on-45th-year-diplomatic-ties-2024-01-01/Liz Lee世界
Taiwan president says ties with China must be decided by will of the peopleTaiwan's relations with China must be decided by the will of the people and peace must be based on "dignity", President Tsai Ing-wen said on Monday after China's leader, Xi Jinping, said "reunification" with the island is inevitable. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 02:14:30 GMT UDME3OP7GVIUXFSEMKOIFN2HZ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-says-ties-with-china-must-be-decided-by-will-people-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ukraine, Russia accuse each other of early New Year's Day attacksUkraine's shelling of Donetsk killed four people, a Russian-installed official said, while Ukrainian officials said at least one person was killed in Russia's air attack on Odesa. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 01:04:44 GMT G7WKYMYDSBMDZE7P7JJ6KXVKRY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine- Russia-accuses-each-other-early-new-years-day-attacks-2024-01-01/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korea's Kim says armed conflict becoming reality because of US - KCNANorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un told the country's military commanders the most powerful means must be mobilized to destroy the United States and South Korea if they choose military confrontation, state media reported on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 00:09:46 GMT LGQ3PH3YBVKEHDQFHLGMPLMZAY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-kim-says-armed-conflict-becoming-reality-because-us-kcna-2024-01-01/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
